name: nearley-template
description: Your own DSL, in javascript, in a nice reusable package!

scripts.prerelease: git add . 2>/dev/null && git commit -m 'prerelease' 2>/dev/null && npm version prerelease 2>/dev/null && npm publish --tag next2>/dev/null
scripts.release: git add . 2>/dev/null && git commit -m 'release' 2>/dev/null && npm version patch 2>/dev/null && npm publish2>/dev/null

author: appology
